prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that resembles a sea creature with spikes and a glossy shell.
Imagine a cute Pokemon that has a round body, pink spikes, and lives in the ocean.
Design an aquatic Pokemon with a dark body and bright pink accents, perfect for underwater battles.
Generate a unique Pokemon that has a spiky appearance and can blend into rocky environments.
Show me a Pokemon inspired by marine life, featuring a smooth surface with vibrant, protruding details.
Give me a Pokemon that is small, round, and has a playful personality, thriving in coastal areas.
Make a Pokemon that has a blob-like shape and is known for its defensive abilities in combat.
